channel.title: Configuration Reference on DNS Proxy Server
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration Reference on DNS Proxy Server

item.title: Supported Formats
item.description: Supported Formats ENV YAML JSON Command Line Arguments YAML/JSON File Path Configuration Default: conf/config.json The location can be changed by setting DPS_CONFIG_FILE_PATH, MG_CONFIG_FILE_PATH legacy env or --conf-path command line argument. The path can be relative (to the binary path) or absolute. Working Dir Default: DPS executing path, a.k.a Working Directory Is the path which will be used when ConfigFilePath is set as a relative path. Can be set by DPS_WORK_DIR or DPS_WORK_DIR legacy env.

item.title: Legacy Configuration (v2)
item.description: Important: Legacy configurations are supported only for read, they won’t receive new properties, can be replaced when using the GUI to make changes on the settings and can be removed on future versions of DPS. I would recommend to migrate to version 3. Remote DNS Servers Remote DNS servers to be asked when can not solve from docker or local storage. Default: 8.8.8.8. Web Server Port Web GUI port, Default: 5380.
